description:
An oriental sword made by a water spirit and gifted to
a monk.Allow the user to strike first more often.
[+2 Speed]
name: "Flowing River"

description:
A sword that used to be wielded by a madman.
If the wielder is mad,increase the Attack stat.
[+2 Attack]
name: "Raging Bull"

description:
Despite the name,this sword is not actually made out of
gold.It seems to attract riches tho.
[+5 Luck]
name: "Spada Aurea"

description:
An imitation of leggendary crossbow who belonged to an
even more leggendary bounty hunter.
Improve crit chance.[+2 Speed]
name: "Raven Crossbow"

description:
A glove with knives installed upon it.Seems to excell
at striking sleeping enemies.
[+1 Speed +1 Attack]
name: "Nightmare Touch"

description:
Just a very solid stick.
Make it harder for the wielder to be stunned.
[+2 Defense]
name: "Ironwood Stick"

description:
A sword which emanates light when near enemies.
It's power to seek out foes make it almost impossible
for them to hide.[+1 M.Attack and Magical Defense]
name: "Foeseeker"

description:
Leggendary sword made using the mane of a Lion made of
fire.Provide protection against magic if the user is on fire.[+1 Attack and Magical Defense]
name: "Flame Mane"

description:
A sword infused with a gem that absorb fire.
Make the user more resistant to fire damage.
[+1 M.Attack and Attack]
name: "Ashenblade"

description:
A sword infused with a gem that absorb Cold.
Make the user more resistant to Cold damage.
[+1 M.Attack and Attack]
name: "Snowborn"

description:
A sword infused with a gem that absorb electricity.
Make the user more resistant to Thunder damage.
[+1 M.Attack and Attack]
name: "Thunderhoof"

description:
A sword infused with a gem that absorb Water.
Make the user more resistant to Water damage.
[+1 M.Attack and Attack]
name: "Waveling"

description:
This cursed weapon increase the Attack of the user if
it has less than 40% of his total HP.
name: "Death's Shadow"

description:
Leggendary sword made using the scales of a turtle made
of ice. Provide protection against physical attacks if the user is frostbitten.[+1 Attack and Magical Defense]
name: "Frost Guard"

description:
Magical Weapon used by a vampire with broken fangs to
steal blood in an inconventional way.
Provide lifesteal to the user.[+1 M.Attack and Attack]
name: "Exquisite Blood"
note:
<HP Life Steal Physical: +20%>
  <HP Life Steal Magical: +20%>
  <HP Life Steal Certain: +20%>

  <HP Life Steal Physical: +5>
  <HP Life Steal Magical: +5>
  <HP Life Steal Certain: +5>

description:
A peculiar scepter wielded by a powerful wizard of old.
Give some mana to the user everytime they land a
magical attack.[+2 M.Attack]
name: "Edwin's Chakragem Scepter"

description:
A peculiar scepter wielded by a powerful wizard of old.
Increase magical attack by a large amount but decrees
max Hp.[+3 M.Attack +30% M.Attack]
name: "Rollod Bloodgem Scepter"

description:
A mace that belonged to an ignorant ape.It seems to
have inherited his ignorance.[+3 Attack][+30% Attack]
name: "Babbala's Mace"

description:
A peculiar scepter wielded by a powerful wizard of old.
Increase healings effect recieved and prevent the
"No heals" effect.[+2 M.Attack]
name: "Vitality Scepter"

description:
A wooden oriental sword that is able to cut just as
deep as an iron one whe not used for training.
Give some UP every turn.[+2 Attack]
name: "Dao of Discipline"

description:
A peculiar scepter wielded by a powerful wizard of old.
Effective in fighting with and against magic.
[+2 M.Attack and M.Defense]
name: "Rahbandis Scepter"

description:
A peculiar scepter wielded by a powerful wizard of old.
Prevent the user from getting Silenced.[+2 M.Attack]
name: "Turvall Scepter"

description:
A pretty common tool used by warriors everywhere.
It allows to lock weapons to your hand,preventing
the wielder from being disarmed.[+1 Atk and Defense]
name: "Locking Gauntlet"

description:
Knife that belonged to a famous assassin.
Increase sneak damage taken by enemies.[+2 Attack]
name: "Corcra's Knife"

description:
A pretty ordinary crossbow imbued with alacrity.
[+2 Speed]
name: Rapid Crossbow

description: A pretty ordinary sword imbued with power.[+2 Attack]
name: Simple Sword

description:
A pretty ordinary scepter imbued with power.
[+1 M.Attack and M.Defense]
name: Simple Scepter

description: A pretty ordinary gauntlet.[+1 Speed and Attack]
name: Simple Gauntlet

description:
A simple grimoire used by novice spellcasters.
[+2 M.Attack]
name: Simple Grimoire

description:
A pretty ordinary sword imbued with magic.
[+1 Attack and M.Attack]
name: Enchanted Sword

description:
It may make moving your hands harder,but it's a staple
when it comes to defensive equipment.
[+2 Defense]
name: Simple Buckler

description:
A blessed shield that seems to heal the wielder wounds.
[+2 Defense]
name: "Gr√ºn's Shield"

description:
A misterious sphere that allow to see the future.
Increase evasion.
[+1 M.attack and M.Defense]
name: "Palantir of Foresight"

description:
A peculiar flintlock that seems to aim on his own.
Make the wielder immune to the "Blind" status effect
by guiding his eyes.
[+1 Speed and Attack]
name: "Fabio's Eye"

description: Just a stick
name: Stick

description:
Peculiars twin blades inbued with speed.
They strike twice and apply bleeding and poison.
[+2 Speed]
name: "Twin Vipers"

description:
A mace that belonged to an ignorant ape.It seems to
have inherited his ignorance.[+5 Attack][+30% Attack]
name: "True Ignorance"

description:
A peculiar scepter wielded by a powerful wizard of old.
Increase magical attack by a large amount but decrees
max Hp.[+5 M.Attack +30% M.Attack]
name: "Goner Scepter"

description:
A very dull sword that can reflect spells away from the
wielder.[+2 M.Defense]
name: "Tarrasque's Spike"

description:
An incredible blade that reflect spells away.
[+1 Attack and M.Attack +2 M.Defense]
name: "Mirror Blade"

description:
A buckler which has a perfect shape to reflect strikes
back to the attacker.[+2 Defense]
name: Parrying Buckler

description:
Just a very solid stick.
Make it harder for the wielder to be stunned.
[+3 Defense]
name: "Reinforced IronwoodStick"

description:
A peculiar scepter wielded by a powerful wizard of old.
Increase healings effect recieved and prevent the
"No heals" effect.[+3 M.Attack +25% Max Hp]
name: "True Vitality Scepter"

description:
Insane weapon made by a madman.Allow the wielder to use
a special skill to shoot Baseball bats.
[+2 Speed and Attack]
name: "Baseball Gun"

description:
An oriental sword made by a water spirit and gifted to
a monk.Allow the user to strike first more often.
[+4 Speed]
name: "Flowing Amenbo-ka"

description:
A sword infused with gems that absorb fire.
Make the user more resistant to fire damage
and inbue his attacks with fire.[+2 M.Atk and Atk]
name: "Fire Macuahuitl"

description:
A sword infused with gems that absorb Cold.
Make the user more resistant to Cold damage
and inbue his attacks with coldness.[+2 M.Atk and Atk]
name: "Frigoriferale"

description:
A sword infused with gems that absorb electricity.
Make the user more resistant to Thunder damage
and inbue attacks with electricity.[+2 M.Atk and Atk]
name: "Qilin"

description:
A sword infused with gems that absorb Water.
Make the user more resistant to Water damage
and inbue his attacks with water.[+2 M.Atk and Atk]
name: "Suijin"

description:
A very poisonous blade that react to the presence of
poisoned enemies.[+2 Attack]
name: "Dokuhebi"

description:
More than a weapon this is a giant piece of meat.
Increase healings effect recieved and prevent the
"No heals" effect.[+3 Attack +25% Max Hp]
name: "Ham-mer"

description:
A cursed weapon that belonged to an animated jack in a
box.The original owner may show up to kill again.
Normal attacks aplly doom[+1 Atk and M.Atk]
name: "Jackbox Soul Reaver"

description:
A weapon from a far away land.Despite being made out of
wood,it's very dangerous.
[+2 Atk and Luck +50% Luck]
name: "Lucky Shillelagh"
